rules.description: For a Case, It auto populates the email id of associated Account's marketing owner.

It automatically nulls the Assigned To field on a Case record if the difference between the current Date/Time and the Last Modified Date/Time exceeds 7 hours, and the "Retain Case" checkbox is not selected.Logic excludes OSS Managers.
rules.formula: IF(AND (OR( NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS North Rep', NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS West Rep' ,NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS East Rep' ,NS_AssignedTo__r.UserRole.Name = 'OSS South Rep'),NS_RetainCaseOwnership__c = false,NS_AssignedTo__c!=null) ,true , false)

rules.description: Creates a Task record for Users assigned the OSS Support Role to process a request for Case deletion.
Increments the value by 1 when ever there is a case release.
cancel case notification email generated cases
Sets Assigned To field to NULL when the Case is Closed.

rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( NS_AssignedTo__c ), RecordType.Name ='Feedback Case', ISPICKVAL(Status ,"NS_New"), NS_AssignedId__c != 'false' )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ( 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 ) AND 17 AND 18 AND 19 AND 20 AND 21
rules.description: This Rule triggers the Intermodal Qualtrics High Freq OB Message

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ( 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 ) AND 17 AND 18 AND 19
rules.description: This Rule triggers the Intermodal Qualtrics Low Freq OB Message
When case ownership is updated to E-Commerce IT queue an email will be sent to ecom_pss@nscorp.com
rules.formula: OR( AND(Owner:Queue.QueueName='E - Commerce IT', ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), AND(ISNEW(), Owner:Queue.QueueName='E - Commerce IT') )

rules.description: Outbound Message Status updates to "expired" after 7 days

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11) AND 12 AND 13 AND (14 AND 15) AND 16 AND 17 AND 18
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11) AND 12 AND 13 AND (14 AND 15) AND 16

rules.description: This workflow clears the "Unread Email" field on the Case object if the Case is Closed or Cancelled.

criteriaItems.value: Action Needed Mechanical,Additional Information Needed Customer,Additional Information Needed - IM Operations,Additional Information Needed Mechanical,Additional Information Needed - Transportation,Awaiting Response - Internal,Case Created in

rules.fullName: Status Reason Update for Low priority

criteriaItems.value: Action Needed Mechanical,Additional Information Needed Customer,Additional Information Needed - IM Operations,Additional Information Needed Mechanical,Additional Information Needed - Transportation,Awaiting Response - Internal,Case Created in

rules.description: This workflow rule sets the Reopened checkbox to TRUE when the Status field is updated to Reopened.
Force cancel all cases with the subject line "TYES LOPI - Warning Bypassed".
This workflow updates the Status value of the Case record to Working if the previous Status value is Awaiting Response and a new email response is received
Upper case for Case Equipment Number

rules.formula: (ISCHANGED( Status ) && ISPICKVAL( Status , "NS_Closed")) ||( ISNEW()&& ISPICKVAL( Status , "NS_Closed") )

rules.description: This rule updates checkbox, if the record is created during After Hours.
rules.formula: AND( OR(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_AutomotiveEmpties', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_AutomotiveLoads', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_AutomotiveParts', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_AutomotiveSupport', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NSSales_Leads_Automotive', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPAutoParts', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPBoxcars', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPCarQuality', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPHoppers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPMetals', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPPrivates', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_EPSupport'), OR( WEEKDAY(TODAY())=1, WEEKDAY(TODAY())=7, HOUR(TIMEVALUE(NOW()-((1/24)*4))) >= 18, HOUR(TIMEVALUE(NOW()-((1/24)*4))) < 8 ) )

rules.description: update Case record OSS VDN field value
update Top21 inquiry Cases recordtype to TOP21
